articles.title: 'Repurposed' drugs showing promise as COVID-19 treatments: Chief Scientist - ABC News
articles.description: Australia's Chief Scientist Dr Alan Finkel has been been chairing the 'Rapid Response Information Forum', set up to support the Government with information during the Covid-19 crisis.
articles.content:
Australia's Chief Scientist Dr Alan Finkel has been playing an important role during the COVID-19 crisis, he's been chairing the 'Rapid Response Information Forum'.

articles.title: UK to test COVID-19 tracing app on the Isle of Wight this week - The Advertiser
articles.description: Health Secretary Matt Hancock said Britain will start testing its own COVID-19 tracing app on the Isle of Wight from Tuesday, hoping that the technology in combination with more testing and tracking will help limit transmission of the coronavirus.
